explains: n. 界限，范围；参数，变量；（统计）人口参数
wordGroup: technical parameter 技术参数；技术参考
design parameter 设计参数；设计规范
system parameter 系统参数；体系参数
parameter adjustment 参数调整；参数平差
welding parameter 焊接参数；焊接工艺参数

sentences.en: If you have enough RAM, set the value of this parameter as large as possible to decrease the indexing time dramatically.
sentences.cn: 如果你有足够的内存，请将该参数的值设置得尽可能大以显著减少索引时间。

sentences.en: If this were more than a demo, some other logic would choose the parameter, perhaps prompting the user to supply the information.
sentences.cn: 如果这不仅仅是一个演示的话，某些其他的逻辑将选择参数，可能会提示用户提供该信息。

sentences.en: There are striking differences in life span between different species, but within one species the parameter is relatively constant.
sentences.cn: 不同物种之间的寿命存在显著差异，但在同一物种内，这一参数是相对稳定的。
